snippet: With an inner determination, deGrom will try to propel the Mets past the Los Angeles Dodgers in a winner-take-all Game 5 of their first-round division series on Thursday night.
abstract: Profile of New York Mets pitcher Jacob deGrom, who is preparing with team for winner-take-all Game 5 of their National League division series against Los Angeles Dodgers; deGrom has risen to occasion and become team's ace, winning National League Rookie of the Year Award in 2014 and recording fourth-lowest ERA. in the NL this year.
lead_paragraph: With an inner determination, deGrom will try to propel the Mets past the Los Angeles Dodgers in a winner-take-all Game 5 of their first-round division series on Thursday night.

headline.print_headline: After Modest Start, Quiet Confidence Lifts the Mets’ Ace
headline.main: After Modest Start, Quiet Confidence Lifts Jacob deGrom
